text: lekin (ai rasool) unamen se jo log ilm (deen) mein bade mazaboot pae par faayaz hain vah aur eemaan vaale to jo (kitaab) tumapar naazil huee hai (sab par eemaan rakhate hain) aur se namaaz padhate hain aur zakaat ada karate hain aur khuda aur roze aakherat ka yaqeen rakhate hain aise hee logon ko ham anaqareeb bahut bada ajr ata faramaenge
